amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike title IV and preserve the SEC requirement that public companies report their information related to corporate financial performance as searchable data.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part A of House Report 114-414 to preserve the SEC requirement that public companies report their information related to corporate financial performance as searchable data.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Maloney, Carolyn amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 248 (Roll no. 59).

action.text: Amendment (A005) offered by Mrs. Maloney, Carolyn.
